meanings.definition: Give authorization or consent for something to happen.
meanings.sent1: Mom permits me to stay up late on weekends.
meanings.sent2: The sign clearly permits parking for customers only.
meanings.sent3: Dad permits the dog to sit on the couch, but not the cat!
meanings.sent4: The key permits access to the hidden garden of wonders.
meanings.sent5: The magic wand permits the wizard to cast powerful spells.

meanings.definition: Official document granting permission to do something.
meanings.sent1: Make sure to carry your building permits when constructing a new house.
meanings.sent2: The driver had all the necessary permits to transport the goods.
meanings.sent3: The treasure map was the permit to search for the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent4: The golden ticket was his permit to enter the chocolate factory.
meanings.sent5: The permit was like a golden ticket to explore the forbidden forest.
